su dṛḍhāni surūpāṇi su grahāṇi ca kārayet

original: tatra svastikayantrāṇi aṣṭādaśāṅgulapramāṇāni siṃhavyāghravṛkatarakṣvṛkṣadvīpimārjāraśṛgālamṛgairivārukakākakaṅkakuraracāsabhāsaśaśaghātyulūkacilliśyenagṛdhrakrauñcabhṛṅgarājāñjalikarṇāvabhañjananandi(ā.ndī)mukhamukhāni masūrākṛtibhiḥ kīlairavabaddhāni mūle 'ṅkuśavadāvṛttavāraṅgāṇi asthividaṣṭaśalyoddharaṇārthamupadiśyante ||
analyzed: tatra svastika yantrāṇi aṣṭādaśa aṅgula pramāṇāni siṃha vyāghra vṛka tarakṣu ṛkṣa dvīpi mārjāra śṛgāla mṛgaiḥ iva āruka kāka kaṅka kurara cāsa bhāsa śaśaghāti ulūka cilli śyena gṛdhra krauñca bhṛṅgarāja añjali karṇāvabhañjana nandi āndīmukha mukhāni masūra ākṛtibhiḥ kīlaiḥ avabaddhāni mūle ṅkuśa vat āvṛtta vāraṅgāṇi asthi vidaṣṭa śalya uddharaṇa artham upadiśyante
sanigrahaḥ nigrahaḥ ca saṃdaṃśau ṣoḍaśa aṅgulau bhvataḥ tau svak na aṃsa sirā snāyu gata śalya uddharaṇa artham upadiśyete
tāla yantre dvādaśa aṅgule matsya tāla vat eka tāla dvi tālake karṇa nāsā nāḍī śalyānām āharaṇa artham

original: nāḍīyantrāṇi apyanekaprakārāṇi anekaprayojanāni ekatomukhānyubhayatomukhāni ca tāni srotogataśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ rogadarśanārthaṃ ācūṣaṇārthaṃ kriyāsaukaryārthaṃ ceti tāni srotodvārapariṇāhāni yathāyogadīrghāṇi ca |
analyzed: nāḍī yantrāṇi api aneka prakārāṇi aneka prayojanāni ekatas mukhāni ubhayatas mukhāni ca tāni srotaḥ gata śalya uddharaṇa artham roga darśana artham ācūṣaṇa artham kriyā saukarya artham ca iti tāni srotaḥ dvāra pariṇāhāni yathā yoga dīrghāṇi ca
tatra bhagandara arśaḥ vraṇa basti uttarabasti mūtravṛddhi dakodara dhūma niruddhaprakaśa sanniruddha guda yantrāṇi alābū śṛṅga yantrāṇi ca uprariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ

original: śalākāyantrāṇyapi nānāprakārāṇi nānāprayojanāni yathāyogapariṇāhadīrghāṇi ca teṣāṃ gaṇḍūpadasarpaphaṇaśarapuṅkhabaḍiśamukhe dve dve eṣaṇavyūhanacālanāharaṇārthamupadiśyete masūradalamātramukhe dve kiṃcidānatāgre srotogataśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ ṣaṭ kārpāsakṛtoṣṇīṣāṇi pramārjanakriyāsu trīṇi darvyākṛtīni khallamukhāni kṣārauṣadhapraṇidhānārthaṃ trīṇyanyāni jāmbavavadanāni trīṇyaṅkuśavadanāni ṣaḍevāgnikarmasvabhipretāni nāsārbudaharaṇārthamekaṃ kolāsthidalamātramukhaṃ khallatīkṣṇoṣṭhaṃ añjanārthamekaṃ kalāyaparimaṇḍalamubhuyato mukulāgraṃ
analyzed: śalākāyantrāṇi api nānā prakārāṇi nānā prayojanāni yathā yoga pariṇāha dīrghāṇi ca teṣām gaṇḍūpada sarpa phaṇa śarapuṅkha baḍiśa mukhe dve dve eṣaṇa vyūhana cālana āharaṇa artham upadiśyete masūra dala mātra mukhe dve kiṃcid ānata agre srotaḥ gata śalya uddharaṇa artham ṣaḍ kārpāsa kṛta uṣṇīṣāṇi pramārjana kriyāsu trīṇi darvī ākṛtīni khalla mukhāni kṣāra auṣadha praṇidhāna artham trīṇi anyāni jāmbava vadan
mūtramārga viśodhana artham ekam mālatī puṣpa vṛnta agra pramāṇa parimaṇḍalam iti

viṃśatiḥ śāstrāṇi tat yathā maṇḍalāgra karapatra vṛddhipatra nakhaśastra mudrikā utpalapatraka ardhadhāra sūcī kuśapatra āṭīmukha śarārimaukha antarmukha trikūrcaka kuṭhārikā vrīhimukha ārā vetasapatraka baḍiśa dantaśaṅku eṣaṇyaḥ iti

original: tatra maṇḍalāgrakarapatre syātāṃ chedane lekhane ca vṛddhipatranakhaśastramudrikotpalapatrakārdhadhārāṇi chedane bhedane ca sūcīkuśapatrāṭīmukhaśarārimukhāntarmukhatrikūrcakāni visrāvaṇe kuṭhārikāvrīhimukhārāvetasapatrakāṇi vyadhane sūcī ca baḍiśaṃ dantaśaṅkuścāharaṇe eṣaṇyeṣaṇe ānulobhye ca sūcyaḥ sīvane ityaṣṭavidhe karmaṇyupayogaḥ śastrāṇāṃ vyākkhyātaḥ ||
analyzed: tatra maṇḍalāgra kara patre syātām chedane lekhane ca vṛddhipatra nakhaśastra mudrikā utpalapatraka ardhadhārāṇi chedane bhedane ca sūcī kuśapatra āṭīmukha śarārimukha antarmukha trikūrcakāni visrāvaṇe kuṭhārikā vrīhimukha ārā vetasapatrakāṇi vyadhane sūcī ca baḍiśam dantaśaṅkuḥ ca āharaṇe eṣaṇī eṣaṇe ānulobhye ca sūcyaḥ sīvane iti aṣṭavidhe karmaṇi upayogaḥ śastrāṇām vyākkhyātaḥ

original: teṣamatha yathāyogaṃ grahaṇasamāsopāyaḥ karmasuvakṣyate tatra vṛddhipatraṃ vṛntaphalasādhāraṇe bhāge gṛhṇīyādbhedanānyevaṃ sarvāṇi vṛddhipatraṃ maṇḍalāgraṃ ca kiṃciduttānena pāṇinā lekhane bahuśo 'vacāryaṃ vṛntāgre visrāvaṇāni viśeṣeṇa tu bālavṛddhasukumārabhīrunārīṇāṃ rājñāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ ca trikūrcakena visrāvayet talapracchāditavṛntamaṅguṣṭhapradeśinībhyāṃ vrīhimukhaṃ kuṭhārikāṃ vāmahastanyastāmitarahastamadhyamāṅgulyā 'ṅguṣṭhaviṣṭabdhayā 'bhihanyāt ārākarapatraiṣaṇyo mūle śeṣāṇi tu yathāyogaṃ kṛhṇīyāt ||
analyzed: teṣam atha yathāyogam grahaṇa samāsa upāyaḥ karmasu vakṣyate tatra vṛddhipatram vṛnta phala sādhāraṇe bhāge gṛhṇīyāt bhedanāni evam sarvāṇi vṛddhipatram maṇḍalāgram ca kiṃcid uttānena pāṇinā lekhane bahuśas vacāryam vṛnta agre visrāvaṇāni viśeṣeṇa tu bāla vṛddha sukumāra bhīru nārīṇām rājñām rājaputrāṇām ca trikūrcakena visrāvayet tala pracchādita vṛntam aṅguṣṭha pradeśinībhyām vrīhimukham kuṭhārikām vā amahar an
teṣām nāmabhiḥ eva ākṛtayaḥ prāyeṇa vyākhyātāḥ

original: tatra nakhaśastraiṣaṇyāvaṣṭāṅgule sūcyo vakṣyante (? pradeśinyagraparvapradeśapramāṇā mudrikā daśāṅgulā śarārimukhī sā ca kartarīti kathyate |) śeṣāṇi tu ṣaḍaṅgulāni ||
analyzed: tatra nakhaśastra eṣaṇyau aṣṭa aṅgule sūcyaḥ vakṣyante pradeśinī agra parva pradeśa pramāṇā mudrikā daśa aṅgulā śarārimukhī sā ca kartarī iti kathyate śeṣāṇi tu ṣaṣ aṅgulāni

original: tāni sugrahāṇi sulohāni sudhārāṇi surūpāṇi susamāhitamukhāgrāṇi akarālāni ceti śastrasaṃpat ||
analyzed: tāni su grahāṇi su lohāni su dhārāṇi surūpāṇi su samāhita mukha agrāṇi akarālāni ca iti śastra saṃpad

original: tatra vakraṃ kuṇṭhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kharadhāraṃ atisthūlaṃ atitucchaṃ atidīrghaṃ atihrasvaṃ ityaṣṭau śastradoṣāḥ |
analyzed: tatra vakram kuṇṭham khaṇḍam khara dhāram ati sthūlam ati tuccham ati dīrgham ati hrasvam iti aṣṭau śastra doṣāḥ

original: tatra puṣpaphalālābūkālindakatrapusai(ā.so)rvārukarkārukaprabhṛtiṣu chedyaviśeṣān darśayet utkartanaparikartanāni copadiśet dṛtibastiprasevakaprabhṛtiṣūdakapaṅkapūrṇeṣu bhedyayogyāṃ saromṇi carmaṇyātate lekhyasya mṛtapaśusirāsūtpalanāleṣu ca vedhyasya ghuṇopahatakāṣṭhaveṇunalanālīśuṣkālābūmukheṣveṣyasya panasabimbībilvaphalamajjamṛtapaśudanteṣvāhāryasya madhūcchiṣṭopalipte śālmalīphalake visrāvyasya sūkṣmaghanavastrāntayormṛducarmāntayośca sīvyasya pustamayapuruśāṅgapratyaṅgaviśeṣeṣu bandhanayogyāṃ

vraṇānām sthira māṃsānām kuryāt dravyaiḥ udīritaiḥ
kaṣāye vidhivat teṣām kṛte ca adhiśrayet punar
surāṣṭrajām sa kāsīsām dadyāt ca api manaḥśilām
haritālam ca matimān tatas tām avacārayet

original: vraṇeṣu dattvā tāṃ tiṣṭhettrīṃstrīṃśca divasān param||
analyzed: vraṇeṣu dattvā tām tiṣṭhet trīn trīn ca divasān param
medaḥ juṣṭān agambhīrān durgandhān cūrṇa śodhanaiḥ
upācaret bhiṣak prājñaḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ śodhanavartijaiḥ
śuddha lakṣaṇa yuktānām kaṣāyam ropaṇam hitam
tatra kāryam yathā uddiṣṭaiḥ dravyaiḥ vaidyena jānatā
avedanānām śuddhānām gambhīrāṇām tathā eva ca
hitāḥ ropaṇa varti aṅga kṛtāḥ ropaṇa vartayaḥ
apeta pūti māṃsānām māṃsa sthānām arohatām
kalkaḥ saṃrohaṇaḥ kāryaḥ tila jaḥ
sa mādhuryāt tathā auṣṇyāt ca snehāt ca anila nāśanaḥ
kaṣāya bhāvāt mādhuryāt tikta tvāt ca api pitta hṛt
auṣṇyāt kaṣāya bhāvāt ca tikta tvāt ca kaphe hitaḥ
śodhayet ropayet ca api yuktaḥ śodhana ropaṇaiḥ
nimba patra madhubhyām tu yuktaḥ saṃśodhanaḥ smṛtaḥ
pūrvābhyām sarpiṣā ca api
tila vat yava kalkam tu kecid āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
śamayet avidagdham ca vidagdham api pācayet
pakvam bhinatti bhinnam ca
pitta rakta viṣa āgantūn gambhīrān api ca vraṇān
ropayet ropaṇīyena kṣīra siddhena sarpiṣā
kapha vāta abhibhūtānām vraṇānām matimān bhiṣak
kārayet ropaṇam tailam
abandhyānām cala sthānām śuddhānām ca praduṣyatām
dvi haridrā yutām kuryāt ropaṇa arthām rasakriyām
samānām sthira māṃsānām tvac sthānām ropaṇam bhiṣak
cūrṇam vidadhyāt matimān prāc sthāna uktaḥ vidhiḥ yathā
śodhanaḥ ropaṇaḥ ca eva vidhiḥ yaḥ yam prakīrtitaḥ
sarva vraṇānām sāmānyena uktaḥ doṣa aviśeṣataḥ
eṣaḥ āgama siddha tvāt tathā eva phala darśanāt
mantra vat saṃprayoktavyaḥ na mīmāṃsyaḥ kathañcana
sva buddhyā ca api vibhajet kaṣāya ādiṣu
bheṣajāni yathāyogam yāni uktāni purā mayā

original: ādye dve pañcamūlyau tu gaṇo yaścānilāpahaḥ||
analyzed: ādye dve pañcamūlyau tu gaṇaḥ yaḥ ca anila apahaḥ
sa vāta duṣṭe dātavyaḥ kaṣāya ādiṣu saptasu
nyagrodhādiḥ gaṇaḥ yaḥ tu kākolyādiḥ ca yaḥ smṛtaḥ
tau pitta duṣṭe dātavyau kaṣāya ādiṣu saptasu
āragvadhādiḥ tu gaṇaḥ yaḥ ca uṣṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: tau deyau kaphaduṣṭe tu saṃsṛṣṭe saṃyatā gaṇāḥ|
analyzed: tau deyau kapha duṣṭe tu saṃsṛṣṭe saṃyatāḥ gaṇāḥ
vāta ātmakān ugara rujān sāsrāvān api ca vraṇān
sa kṣauma yava sarpirbhiḥ dhūpana aṅgaiḥ ca dhūpayet
pariśuṣka alpa māṃsānām gambhīrāṇām tathā eva ca
kuryāt utsādanīyāni sarpīṃṣi ālepanāni ca
māṃsa āśinām ca māṃsāni bhakṣayet vidhivat naraḥ
viśuddha manasaḥ tasya māṃsam māṃsena vardhate
utsanna mṛdu māṃsānām vraṇānām avasādanam
kuryāt dravyaiḥ yathā uddiṣṭaiḥ cūrṇitaiḥ madhunā saha
kaṭhinānām amāṃsānām duṣṭānām matiriśvanā

original: mṛdvī kriyā vidhātavyā śoṇitaṃ cāpi mokṣayet|
analyzed: mṛdvī kriyā vidhātavyā śoṇitam ca api mokṣayet

original: mṛdutvamāśurohaṃ ca gāḍho bandhaḥ karoti hi|
analyzed: mṛdu tvam āśu roham ca gāḍhaḥ bandhaḥ karoti hi
varṇeṣu mṛdu māṃseṣu dāruṇīkaraṇam hitam
dhava priyaṅgu aśokānām rohiṇyāḥ ca tvacaḥ tathā
triphalā dhātakī puṣpa rodhra sarja rasān samān
kṛtvā sūkṣmāṇi cūrṇāni vraṇam taiḥ avacūrṇayet
utsanna māṃsān kaṭhinān kaṇḍū yuktān cira utthitān
tathā eva khalu duḥśodhyām śodhayet kṣāra karmaṇā
sravataḥ śmabhavāt mūtram ye ca anye rakta vāhinaḥ
niḥśeṣa chinna sandhīn ca sādhayet agnikarmaṇā
durūḍha tvāt tu śuklānām kṛṣṇakarma hitam bhavet
bhallātakān vāsayet tu kṣīre prāc mūtra bhāvitān

original: tato dvidhā cchedayitvā lauhe kumbhe nidhāpayet||
analyzed: tatas dvidhā chedayitvā lauhe kumbhe nidhāpayet

original: kumbhe 'nyasmin nikhāte tu taṃ kumbhamatha yojayet|
analyzed: kumbhe nikhāte tu tam kumbham atha yojayet
mukham mukhena sandhāya gomayaiḥ dāhayet tatas
yaḥ snehaḥ cyavate tasmāt grāhayet tam śanais bhiṣak
grāmya ānūpa śaphān dagdhvā sūkṣma cūrṇāni kārayet
tailena anena saṃsṛṣṭam śuklam ālepayet vraṇam
bhallātaka vidhānena sāra snehān tu kārayet

original: ye ca kecit phalasnehā vidhānaṃ teṣu pūrvavat1|
analyzed: ye ca kecid phala snehāḥ vidhānam teṣu
durūḍha tvāt tu kṛṣṇānām pāṇḍukarma hitam bhavet
tena eva piṣṭam su ślakṣṇam sa varṇa karaṇam hitam
kāsīsam madhukam ca eva kṣaudra yuktam pralepayet
kapitthim uddhṛte māṃse mūtreṇa ājena pūrayet
veṇu nirlekhanam ca api prapunnāḍa rasāñjanam
adhastāt arjunasya etat māsam bhūmau nidhāpayet
māsāt ūrdhvam tatas tena kṛṣṇam ālepayet vraṇam
kukkuṭa aṇḍa kapālāni katakam madhukam samam
tathā samudramaṇḍūkī maṇi cūrṇam ca dāpayet
guṭikāḥ mūtra piṣṭāḥ tāḥ vraṇānām pratisāraṇam
hastidanta masīm kṛtvā mukhyam ca eva rasāñjanam
romāṇi etena jāyante lepāt pāṇi taleṣu api
catuṣpadānām tvak roma khura śṛṅga asthi bhasmanā

roma ākīrṇaḥ vraṇaḥ yaḥ tu na samyak uparohati
kṣura kartari sandaṃśauḥ tasya romāṇi nirharet
śaṅkha cūrṇasya bhāgau dvau haritālam ca bhāgikam
śuktena saha piṣṭāni loma śātanam uttamam
tailam bhallātakasya atha snuhī kṣīram tathā eva ca

original: kadalīdīrghavṛntābhyāṃ bhasmālaṃ lavaṇaṃ śamībījaṃ śītodapiṣṭaṃ vā romaśātanamācaret||
analyzed: kadalī dīrghavṛntābhyām bhasma ālam lavaṇam śamī bījam śīta uda piṣṭam vā roma śātanam ācaret
āgāragodhikā puccham rambhā ālam bījam aiṅgudam
dagdhvā tad bhasma taila ambu sūrya pakvam kaca antakṛt
vāta duṣṭaḥ vraṇaḥ yaḥ tu rūkṣaḥ ca atyartha vedanaḥ
adhaḥkāye viśeṣeṇa tatra vastiḥ vidhīyate
mūtrāghāte mūtra doṣe śukra doṣe aśmarī vraṇe

original: yasmācchudhyati bandhena vraṇo yāti ca mārdavam|

original: patradānaṃ bhavet kāryaṃ yathādoṣaṃ yathartu ca||
analyzed: patradānam bhavet kāryam yathādoṣam yathartu ca
eraṇḍa bhūrja pūtīka haridrāṇām tu vāta je
patram āśvabalam yat ca kāśmarī patram eva ca

original: patraṃ ca śukanāsāyā yojayet kaphaje vraṇe||
analyzed: patram ca śukanāsāyāḥ yojayet kapha je vraṇe
akarkaśam avicchinnam ajīrṇam sukumārakam
ajantujagdham mṛdu ca patram guṇavat ucyate
sneham auṣadha sāram ca paṭṭaḥ
yat tatas patram lepasya upari dāpayet
śaitya auṣṇya janana arthāya sneha saṃgrahaṇāya ca
datta auṣadheṣu dātavyam patram vaidyena jānatā
makṣikāḥ vraṇam āgatya niḥkṣipanti yadā kṛmīn
śvayathuḥ bhakṣite taiḥ tu jāyate bhṛśa dāruṇaḥ
tīvrāḥ rujaḥ vicitrāḥ ca rakta āsrāvaḥ ca jāyate
surasādiḥ hitaḥ tatra dhāvane pūraṇe tathā
hitāḥ go mūtra piṣṭāḥ ca sekaḥ kṣāra udakena vā
pracchādya māṃsa peśyāḥ vā kṛmīt apaharet vraṇāt
viṃśatim kṛmi jātīḥ tu vaksyāmi upari bhāgaśas
dīrgha kāla āturāṇām tu kṛśānām vraṇa śoṣiṇām
bṛṃhaṇīyaḥ vidhiḥ sarvaḥ kāya agnim parirakṣatā

original: kaṇḍūmantaḥ saśophāśca ye ca jatrūpari vraṇāḥ|

original: vraṇeṣu teṣu kartavyaṃ nasyaṃ vaidyena jānatā||
analyzed: vraṇeṣu teṣu kartavyam nasyam vaidyena jānatā
doṣa pracyāvana arthāya rujā dāha kṣayāya ca

original: uṣṇo vā yadi vā śītaḥ kavalagraha iṣyate||
analyzed: uṣṇaḥ vā yadi vā śītaḥ kavalagrahaḥ iṣyate
ūrdhva jatru gatān rogān vraṇān ca kapha vāta jān
śopha srāva rujā yuktān dhūma pānaiḥ upācaret
kṣata ūṣmaṇaḥ nigraha artham sandhāna artham tathā eva ca
sadyovraṇeṣu āyateṣu kṣaudra sarpiḥ vidhīyate
avagāḍhāḥ tu aṇu mukhāḥ ye vraṇāḥ śalya pīḍitāḥ
nivṛtta hasta uddharaṇāḥ yantram teṣu vidhīyate
laghu mātraḥ laghuḥ ca eva snigdhaḥ uṣṇaḥ gni dīpanaḥ
sarva vraṇibhyaḥ deyaḥ tu sadā āhāraḥ vijānatā

rakṣā vidhānaiḥ uddiṣṭaiḥ yamaiḥ sa niyamaiḥ tata hā
ṣaṣ mūlaḥ ṣṭa parigrāhī pañca lakṣaṇa lakṣitaḥ
ṣaṣṭyā cidhānaiḥ nirdiṣṭaiḥ caturbhiḥ sādhyate vraṇaḥ
yaḥ lpa auṣadha kṛtaḥ yogaḥ bahu grantha bhayāt mayā
dravyāṇām tad samānānām tatra āvāpaḥ na duṣyati

tatra gandha ādayaḥ pañca vraṇasya upadravāḥ smṛtāḥ
jvara atisārau mūrcchā ca hikkā chardiḥ arocakaḥ
śvāsa kāsa avipākāḥ ca tṛṣṇā ca vraṇitasya tu
vraṇa kriyāsu evam āsu vyāsena uktāsu api kriyām

original: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāṃ cikitsāsthāne dvivraṇīyacikitsitaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ||1||
analyzed: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyām cikitsā sthāne dvivraṇīyacikitsitam nāma prathamaḥ
dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

yathā uvāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ

viśvāmitra sutam śiṣyam ṛṣṭim suśrutam anvaśāt

original: nānārūpā vraṇā ye syusteṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam||

original: doṣajā vā svayaṃ bhinnā na tu vaidyanimittajāḥ|
